 {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.

OG_2:
Made 3 mana, AA costs 2, draw as a sacrifice.

OG_1:
When Filtering Star (Downshift) enters the battlefield, draw a card.
1, T, Sacrifice Filtering Star (Downshift): Add two mana in any combination of colors. This mana can’t be spent on casting a nonartifact spell.
